en-US.summary: Statistics from every reporting country available as of todays date.
examplePhrases: Alexa ask corona virus statistics for Finland
Alexa tell corona virus statistics in United States
Alexa ask corona virus information on Japan
en-US.name: COVID-19 Statistics
en-US.description:
This skill uses publicly available data about current confirmed cases, deaths, and recoveries of the COVID-19 virus AKA Coronavirus compiled by Johns Hopkins University. In the current version supports filtering by countries. 
In future versions other filters will be added. 
Open to any suggestions.
